Vindictus.GM Coin S5: BINGOctus:
g]https://nxcache.nexon.net/cms/2025/q1/1772/twitter_official_twt_913x512.jpg[/img]

[b][u]Event Period[/u]
[/b]Mar 25th, 2025 (After Maintenance) - May 20th, 2025 (Before Maintenance)
 

Mercenaries,
Spring is here in Vindictus, which means it's time to warm up ourselves for another new year!

How many missions can you clear before the event ends?
 

[u][b]Event Details[/b][/u]
1. Clear at least 3 missions from the given list, and fill out a BINGO.
[list]
[*] At least three missions must be crossed out to participate.
[*] When completing missions, the three missions should be aligned into a single line to create a BINGO.
[/list]2. When participating, screenshots to prove completion of each mission must be atttached.
[list]
[*] Participation without eligible screenshots will not be counted.
[/list]3. Users participating with all nine missions will receive a special "Discord Role: All Rounder."


[u][b]Event Participation Format[/b][/u]
[list][*]Server (NA/EU)[/*][/list][list][*]IGN[/*][/list][list][*]List of Missions cleared (Check the Bingo event image or List missions by text)[/*][/list][list][*]Screenshots for verifying completion (For each mission)[/*][/list]
 

[u][b]Mission Details[/b][/u]
[table][tr][td][b]Mission[/b][/td][/tr][tr][td]Talk to Ferghus[/td][/tr][tr][td]Take a bath at the Hot Springs[/td][/tr][tr][td]Meet up with a guildmate at the guild house.[/td][/tr][tr][td]Participate in a battle as a party of 2 or more people.[/td][/tr][tr][td]Sell(Upload) an item at the Marketplace.[/td][/tr][tr][td]Complete one Red Moon's Energy Battle[/td][/tr][tr][td]Create on item with Expertise[/td][/tr][tr][td]Take a screenshot under the cherry blossom tree[/td][/tr][tr][td]Complete one Redeemer's Battle[/td][/tr][/table]


[u][b]Reward Details[/b][/u]
[list][*]Participants will receive 20 GM Coins[/*][/list][list][*][u]If the total number of participants reach 80 people, Non-participants will receive 10 GM Coins.[/u][/*
Vindictus.GM Coin Event: Season 5:
https://discord.gg/vindictus]Official Discord Community[/url][/b].

2. Event Participants win special GM Coins as rewards

3. If each event reaches a certain number of participants, Non-participants receive GM Coins as well
[list]
[*] Non-Participants receive a smaller rewards than event participants.
[/list]4. Exchange GM Coins for special rewards in our limited in-game shop.

[b][u]Event Period[/u]

[b][u]Exchange Shop Period[/u]
[/b]Mar 25th, 2025 (After Maintenance) - Apr 29th, 2025 (Before Maintenance)

(* Account Based Event)


[u][b]Event Details[/b][/u]
1. Obtain [u]Lost Coins[/u] upon clearing Region Raid Battles (up to 25 per week).
[list]
[*] Weekly limits will reset every Tuesday at 7 AM UTC.
[*] Lost Coins can be received via account mail upon completing battle.
[*] You can receive Lost Coins by using Resenlian's Battle Completion Scroll.
[*] You can earn twice as many Lost Coins in Hero+ Mode.
[/list]
2. Exchange the coins obtained for rewards at the Exchange Shop.
[list]
[*] Lost Coins can be used until 4/29/2025 07:00 AM UTC.
[/list]
(* List of Eligible Battles are listed below.)

Vindictus.Ver. 3.22 Update Note:
o, this is the Vindictus team.
Below are the list of changes available after the version update on [b]March 25th, 2025.[/b]

[b]Table of Contents[/b]
[olist][*]Changes to Event Notifications[/*][*]Story Skip Function[/*][*]Temporary Guild Support[/*][*]In-Game Spring Seasonal Theme[/*][*]Special Spring Log-in Gift[/*][*]Bug Fix[/*][/olist]


[b][u]1. Changes to Event Notifications[/u][/b]
[list][*]The Event Notification UI has been improved into a calendar format.[/*][/list][list][*]
The new Event Notification calendar supports both schedules for current events and upcoming events.
[/*][/list][list][*][list][*]Upcoming events are subject to change / cancel before their release, depending on their circumstances.[/*][/list][/*][/list][list][*]A new feature, 'Permanent Event Menu' has been added.[/*][/list][list][*][list][*]Events ongoing permanently can be viewed from the new menu.[/*][/list][/*][/list]

[b][u]2. Story Skip Function[/u][/b]
[list][*]The Story Skip function is now available.[/*][/list][list][*]A previous title, "Title: Rocheste Tourist" has been added to the Ancient Title Destiny Box.[/*][/list]

[b][u]3. Temporary Guild Support[/u][/b]
[list][*]From March 25th to April 29th, Guild House Dues will be discounted.[/*][/list][list][*][list][*]During the period, all Guild House Dues will have an additional 5% off. [/*][/list][/*][/list][list][*][list][*]The discount will be applied to the following month.[/*][/list][/*][/list][list][*]GP obtained from Guild Missions will be doubled during the support period.[/*][/list]

[b][u]4. In-game Spring Seasonal Theme[/u][/b]
[list][*]From March 25th to April 22nd, the in-game theme will be changed to Spring maps.[/*][/list][list][*]The main starting screen will change to spring seasonal theme.[/*][/list][list][*]Colhen / Rocheste / Malina are subject to change.[/*][/list][list][*][list][*]Desolate Malina will not be changed.[/*][/list][/*][/list][list][*]When moving to Colhen / Rocheste, the loading screen will be changed to the spring theme.[/*][/list][list][*]The lobby loading screen before the Colhen quest departure will be changed to the spring theme.[/*][/list][list][*]New character Friendship lines have been added.[/*][/list]

[b][u]5. Special Spring Log-in Gift[/u][/b]
[list][*]From March 25th to April 22nd, upon logging in with a character Lv.1+ you will receive a "Dance of Flowers Effect Box" via mail.[/*][/list]

[b][Item Details][/b]
[table][tr][td][b]Item Name[/b][/td][td][b]Claimable Character[/b][/td][td][b]Expiration[/b][/td][/tr][tr][td]Dance of Flowers (30 Days)[/td][td]Female / Male[/td][td]30 days[/td][/tr][tr][td]Dance of Flowers (30 Days)[/td][td]Karok[/td][td]30 days[/td][/tr][tr][td]Dance of Flowers (30 Days)[/td][td]Hurk / Grimden[/td][td]30 days[/td][/tr][/table]

[u][b]6. Bug Fix[/b][/u]

[b][Battle][/b]
[list][*]
Fixed an issue where the enchant effect applying even in situations when you cannot use Artifacts, like when you are holding an item, aiming a secondary weapon, etc.
[/*][*]
Fixed an isssue where characters getting stuck when going up the hill after entering the battle region for "The One Who Protects the Altar."
[/*][*]Fixed an issue where the map brightness appears unnatural when entering the battle region for "The One Who Protects the Altar."[/*][/list][list][*]Fixed an issue where the light pillar effect did not show when obtaining "Uaithne Fragment: The Cursed Belt" in "Glutton's Banquet."[/*][/list][list][*]Fixed an issue where the light pillar effect did not show when obtaining an "Outfit Recipe Scroll" in a Special Dungeon.[/*][/list]

[b][Misc.][/b]
[list][*]Fixed an issue where the user could not obtain an AP 500 capsule upon completing the story 'Getaway.'[/*][/list][list][*]Fixed an issue where the story repeats itself from the beginning when selecting "No" for a Redeemers story branch.[/*][/list
